name: The Tale of Marena's Deft
summary: You are Marena, the spirit of death. You have spent many nights chasing a demon-queen Dukljana the Deathless, climbing to the very heights of Mount Troyan. If you can't stop her, she will steal the sun itself and who knows what will happen to the world then! Inspired by Touhou games (especially the early ones) and Slavic folk mythology.
